Test Piece Contest
The Dawn of Spring
Rug Park, Corwen, Denbighshire, Wales, UK
March contest 1st Ruthin, 2nd Deudraeth, 3rd Llanrug. Best soloist - Derek Lloyd Jones (14yrs) cornet - Llanrug. Best soprano - Gordon Wheeler - Gwespyr. Best Eb Bass - Derek Lloyd - Gwespyr.
9 bands competed.
